home.headline: MLOps Engineer and Data Scientist building production-grade machine learning systems.
about: I design and deploy end-to-end ML systems: data pipelines, modeling, cloud infrastructure, monitoring, and dashboards.
My background combines applied machine learning, AWS cloud architecture, and engineering rigor, with experience in predictive maintenance, computer vision, and time-series forecasting.
I completed an intensive MLOps learning plan and focus on reliable, interpretable, scalable ML delivery.

work.title: Data Scientist / MLOps Engineer
highlights: Developed a predictive maintenance system for industrial equipment using sensor data.
Built and evaluated models (Ridge, Random Forest, LSTM) with emphasis on interpretability and operational usability.
Designed feature extraction workflows for time-series signals.
Created dashboards to visualize machine health, trends, and maintenance alerts.

work.title: AWS Cloud Engineer
highlights: Delivered standardized EC2 golden images to streamline deployments (reported ~80% efficiency improvement).
Automated AWS usage and cost dashboards to support decision-making.

work.title: Data Scientist Research Assistant
highlights: Applied U-Net to satellite imagery for ice concentration prediction and land classification.
Achieved strong validation performance (0.026 MSE; ~0.9 classification accuracy).
Evaluated multiple model architectures to select the most effective approach.

projects.title: Brilliant Automation
projects.tagline: Predictive maintenance and equipment health monitoring (end-to-end).
bullets: Sensor data ingestion and feature engineering for time-series signals.
Interpretable ML models for failure forecasting.
Dashboards for operational monitoring and decision support.

projects.title: AI Wall Painting Robot
projects.tagline: Computer vision segmentation for robotic painting workflows.
bullets: Implemented PSPNet for wall segmentation (92% accuracy, 73% IoU).
Data preprocessing and augmentation for industrial CV.
